mysql.user: Username to login to MySQL database
mysql.password: Password to login to MySQL database
mysql.schema: Schema to use in MySQL database

path.url: Directory that Poggit is installed in, or empty string if installed at root

app.defaultToken: A zero-scope dummy-user access token used for GitHub API access when client is not logged in

meta.extPath: Slash-trailing URL to the root directory of this website, e.g. http://example.com/poggit/
meta.hookSecret: Secure part of a secret for GitHub webhooks. Never change this value, or all webhooks will break.
meta.email: Email used for signing Git commits
meta.tmpPath: Path to temp directory. Set to null to use system tmp directory.
